snippet: The Nevada rancher Cliven Bundy and his sons, Ammon and Ryan, were among those indicted over a 2014 standoff involving cattle.
abstract: Federal grand jury indicts Nevada rancher Cliven Bundy, his sons Ammon and Ryan, Peter T Santilli Jr and Ryan W Payne for standoff with federal authorities in 2014 over cattle grazing on public land; men face charges including assaulting federal officer.
lead_paragraph: The Nevada rancher Cliven Bundy and his sons, Ammon and Ryan, were among those indicted over a 2014 standoff involving cattle.

headline.main: Cliven Bundy and Sons Charged in Case That Gave Rise to Oregon Standoff
headline.print_headline: Charges for 5 in Nevada Case That Gave Rise to Standoff
